comment: Sweet and nutty on the nose, smooth, creamy, chocolate and nuts on the palate, medium finish.
Very worth the price. Found at my local Total Wine for $23 a handle and decided why not because of the current quarantine. Enjoying it quite a bit.

I’m gonna say that I didn’t have high expectations on this whisky at $13 a bottle. However, a very pleasant surprise. A very smooth whisky along the lines of Dalmore. Oaky, buttery, honey and very floral on the nose. For $13 a bottle, it’s a fantastic buy.
Right sweet &oak balance,  very cheap whiskey!
